InitBlock.name: New Activity Interval for Opportunity

DBMapItem.name: DefaultMulDB
DBMapItem.Value: select VAL_NUM FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_VARIABLES_G WHERE R_TYPE='OPT_NEED_ACT_NUMDAYS' AND APP_NAME ='Usage Accelerator'

InitBlock.InitString: select VAL_NUM FROM VALUEOF(OLAPTBO).W_VARIABLES_G WHERE R_TYPE='OPT_NEED_ACT_NUMDAYS' AND APP_NAME ='Usage Accelerator'
